summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.3°C) and outside temperature (up 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 7410 lux) and cloud levels (up 306 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 12889 lux), cloud levels (up 1886 m), outside temperature (up 1.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 713m to 1594m and averaged 761.4m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air and winds will be practically absent. Periods of rain anticipated, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
